translation.en: How long until we get to his estate?
translation.zh: 还要多久才能到他的地产？

translation.en: We’ve been flying over his estate for the past two hours.
translation.zh: 我们已经在他的地产上空 飞了两个小时了

translation.en: You’re leaving me here?
This is as close as I’m allowed to get to the building.
translation.zh: 我最多只被允许靠那栋楼这么近了

translation.en: What building?
Follow the river. Got it.
Keep your head down and get clear of the rotors. Okay.
translation.zh: 低下头 别碰到螺旋桨 好的

translation.en: [ Female Electronic Voice ] Caleb Smith.
Yes?
Please approach the console and face the screen.
translation.zh: 请靠近操作台 面向屏幕

translation.en: Take your key card.
You may now enter the residence.
translation.zh: 你现在可以进入住宅了

translation.en: Hello?
Hello?
Caleb Smith.
Hey.
Dude!
I’ve been so looking forward to this week with you.
translation.zh: 我很期待和你共度本周

translation.en: -Come in. Come on in. -Thanks.
translation.zh: 来吧 进来 谢谢

translation.en: You want something to eat or... drink after your journey?
translation.zh: 旅途劳顿 想吃点或者喝点什么吗？

translation.en: No. No, thanks. I’m fine.
translation.zh: -不 不 谢谢 不必了 -你确定？

translation.en: You sure? Yeah.
To be honest, I thought we’d have, uh, breakfast together,
translation.zh: 说实话 我本想和你 共进早餐 但是…

translation.en: but, um, I can’t really eat anything.
translation.zh: 共进早餐 但是… 我完全没胃口

translation.en: I got the mother of all fucking hangovers. Oh, yeah?
Oh, my God. Like you wouldn’t even believe.
translation.zh: 哦 天呐 说出来你可能不信

translation.en: When I have a heavy night, I, uh, compensate the next morning–
translation.zh: 如果我哪天晚上喝高了 第二天早上我就要弥补 锻炼身体 服用抗氧化物质等等

translation.en: exercise, antioxidants. You know.
translation.zh: 第二天早上我就要弥补 锻炼身体 服用抗氧化物质等等

translation.en: Yeah. Sure.
Was it a good party?
-Party? -Yeah. Wasn’t there a party?
translation.zh: -派对？ -对啊 昨晚没开派对吗？

translation.en: There wasn’t a party. Sorry.
Caleb, I’m just gonna throw this out there so it’s said, okay?
translation.zh: 凯勒布 我们就有话直说 好吧？

translation.en: -You’re freaked out. -I am?
translation.zh: 你害怕了 -是吗？ -是的 你害怕了

translation.en: Yeah. You’re freaked out by the helicopter and the mountains and the house,
translation.zh: -是吗？ -是的 你害怕了 直升机、高山、豪宅让你害怕了

translation.en: ’cause it’s all so super cool.
And you’re freaked out by me, to be meeting me...
translation.zh: 过来与我见面 你被我吓怕了

translation.en: and having this conversation in this room at this moment, right?
translation.zh: 此刻在这个房间里和我对话 都让你害怕了 对吗？

translation.en: And I get that. I get the moment you’re having.
translation.zh: 我都懂 我能体会你现在的心情 不过…

translation.en: But, dude, can we just get past that?
translation.zh: 我都懂 我能体会你现在的心情 不过… 伙计 让我们忘记那些东西吧？

translation.en: Can we just be two guys, Nathan and Caleb,
translation.zh: 就我们两个人？内森和凯勒布

translation.en: not the whole employer-employee thing?
translation.zh: 脱离老板和员工的雇佣关系

translation.en: Yeah? Yeah. Sor– Uh, yeah.
translation.zh: -好啊 行 -行吗？ 好 可以

translation.en: It’s good to meet you, Nathan.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 内森

translation.en: It’s good to meet you too, Caleb.
translation.zh: 我也很高兴见到你 凯勒布

translation.en: Well, I guess the first thing I should do is explain your pass.
translation.zh: 我想首先我应该帮你认认路

translation.en: Now, it’s simple enough. It opens some doors and it doesn’t open others.
translation.zh: 非常简单 用你的钥匙卡 有些门能打开 有些门打不开

translation.en: And that just makes everything easy for you, right? Uh, yes.
translation.zh: 这样其实就简单了 对吗？

translation.en: Yeah. ’Cause you’re like, "Oh, fuck, I’m in someone else’s house.
translation.zh: 对 因为你可能会想 “喔 我在别人的房子里

translation.en: Can I do this? Can I do that?"
And this card, it just takes all that worry away.
translation.zh: 而这张卡 会打消你所有的顾虑

translation.en: If you try a door and it stays shut, okay, it’s off-limits.
translation.zh: 如果你试着开一扇门 结果门没开 说明你不能进去

translation.en: You try another door and it opens, then it’s for you.
translation.zh: 你试另一扇门 门开了 说明你可以进

translation.en: Let’s try this one.
I guess it’s for you, Caleb.
translation.zh: 看来你可以进去 凯勒布

translation.en: You like? Yeah.
It’s your room.
You’ve got a bed here.
A bathroom right back here.
A little desk.
Cupboards.
A little fridge.
Cozy, right? Yeah. This is great.
translation.zh: 很舒适吧？ 是的 很棒

translation.en: What? Sorry?
-There’s something wrong. What’s wrong? -There’s nothing wrong.
translation.zh: 你有点不对劲 怎么了？ 没怎么啊

translation.en: It’s the windows.
You’re thinking there’s no windows.
It’s subterranean. It’s not cozy. It’s claustrophobic.
translation.zh: 你心里暗自这么想 这里不舒适 这里幽闭恐怖

translation.en: No. No way. I wasn’t thinking that.
translation.zh: 不 没有 我没那么想

translation.en: I was thinking this is really cool.
Caleb, there’s a reason there are no windows in this room.
translation.zh: 凯勒布 这个房间没有窗户 是有原因的

translation.en: There is? Uh-huh.
This building isn’t a house.
It’s a research facility.
Buried in these walls is enough fiber-optic cable to reach the moon and lasso it.
translation.zh: 墙里面安装的光缆 足够伸到月球 并绕月球一周

translation.en: And I wanna talk to you about what I’m researching.
translation.zh: 我想告诉你我在研究什么

translation.en: I wanna share it with you.
In fact, I wanna share it with you so much, it’s eating me up inside.
translation.zh: 事实上 我迫不及待要和你分享

translation.en: But there’s something I need you to do for me first.
translation.zh: 但我需要你先为我做点事

translation.en: "Blue Book nondisclosure agreement."
Take your time. Read it over.
"The signee agrees to regular data audit with unlimited access...
translation.zh: “签署人同意接受 无限制的定期数据审查

translation.en: to confirm that no disclosure of information has taken place...
translation.zh: 以便确认签署人 没有通过任何通讯方式

translation.en: in public or private forums,
translation.zh: 包括但不限于口头形式

translation.en: using any means of communication,
including but not limited to that which is disclosed orally...
or in written or electronic form."
I think I need a lawyer.
-It’s standard. -It doesn’t feel very standard.
translation.zh: -只是一份普通协议 -感觉并不普通

translation.en: Okay, it’s not standard.
translation.zh: 好吧 这不是普通协议

translation.en: What can I tell you, Caleb? You don’t have to sign it. You know?
translation.zh: 我还能说什么呢 凯勒布？你不必签

translation.en: We could spend the next few days just shooting pool, getting drunk together, bonding.
translation.zh: 在接下来这几天里 我们也可以只是玩一玩 喝喝酒 加深一下感情

translation.en: And when you discover what you’ve missed out on in about a year,
translation.zh: 等到一年之后你发现自己错过了什么

translation.en: you’re gonna regret it for the rest of your life.
Good call.
So–
Do you know what the Turing Test is?
translation.zh: 你知道什么是“图灵测试”吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
I know what the Turing Test is.
translation.zh: 我知道什么是“图灵测试”

translation.en: It’s when a human interacts with a computer.
translation.zh: 它指的是让一个人与一台计算机互动

translation.en: And if the human doesn’t know they’re interacting with a computer,
translation.zh: 如果这个人没有发现 和他互动的其实是一台计算机

translation.en: the test is passed.
And what does a pass tell us?
That the computer has artificial intelligence.
translation.zh: 意味着那台电脑具有人工智能

translation.en: Are you building an AI?
I’ve already built one.
And over the next few days,
you’re gonna be the human component in the Turing Test.
translation.zh: 你就将扮演“图灵测试”中的那个人

translation.en: Holy shit. Yeah, that’s right, Caleb. You got it.
translation.zh: -不是吧 -没错 凯勒布 就是你

translation.en: ’Cause if that test is passed,
translation.zh: 因为如果测试通过的话

translation.en: you are dead center of the greatest scientific event in the history of man.
translation.zh: 你 将成为这起人类历史上 最伟大的科学事件的核心人物

translation.en: If you’ve created a conscious machine, it’s not the history of man.
translation.zh: 如果你研制出一台具有意识的机器 那就不是人类历史上的奇迹

translation.en: That’s the history of gods.
translation.zh: 而是众神历史上的奇迹

translation.en: Hello.
Hi.
I’m Caleb.
Hello, Caleb.
Do you have a name?
Yes.
Ava.
I’m pleased to meet you, Ava.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你 伊娃

translation.en: I’m pleased to meet you too.
I’ve never met anyone new before.
Only Nathan.
Then I guess we’re both in quite a similar position.
[ Ava ] Haven’t you met lots of new people before?
translation.zh: 你也从未结识过新人吗？

translation.en: None like you.
So we need to break the ice.
Do you know what I mean by that? Yes.
-What do I mean? -Overcome initial social awkwardness.
translation.zh: 我什么意思？ 打破初次见面时的尴尬气氛

translation.en: So let’s have a conversation.
[ Ava ] Okay.
What would you like to have a conversation about?
Why don’t we start with you telling me something about yourself?
translation.zh: 不如你先自我介绍一下吧？

translation.en: What would you like to know?
Whatever comes into your head.
Well, you already know my name.
translation.zh: 好吧 你已经知道我的名字了

translation.en: And you can see that I’m a machine.
translation.zh: 你也看得出来我是一台机器

translation.en: Would you like to know how old I am? Sure.
I’m one.
One what?
-One year or one day? -One.
When did you learn how to speak, Ava?
translation.zh: 你什么时候学会说话的 伊娃？

translation.en: I always knew how to speak.
And that’s strange, isn’t it?
Why?
Because language is something that people acquire.
translation.zh: 因为语言是人类的专长

translation.en: Well, some people believe language exists from birth,
translation.zh: 有人认为语言能力是与生俱来的

translation.en: and what is learned is the ability to attach words and structure to the latent ability.
translation.zh: 我们所学的不过是将词语和结构 与这种潜在的能力相结合 这种说法你同意吗？

translation.en: -Do you agree with that? -I don’t know.
translation.zh: 与这种潜在的能力相结合 这种说法你同意吗？ 我不知道

translation.en: Will you come back tomorrow, Caleb?
translation.zh: 你明天还来吗 凯勒布？

translation.en: Yes.
Good.
Oh, man, she’s fascinating.
When you talk to her, you’re just–
translation.zh: 和她交谈 感觉就像…

translation.en: Through the looking glass.
"Through the looking glass." Wow.
You’re good with words, Caleb. You’re quotable.
translation.zh: 你真会措辞 凯勒布 你的话值得引用

translation.en: Actually, that’s someone else’s quote.
translation.zh: 是我引用了别人的作品名称

translation.en: I wrote down that other line you came up with.
translation.zh: 我还记下了你说过的另一句话

translation.en: About how if I’ve invented a machine with consciousness, I’m not a man. I’m God.
translation.zh: 你那天说 如果我发明了一台有意识的机器 我就不是人 而是神

translation.en: I don’t think that’s exactly what I–
I thought, "Fuck, man, that is so good when we get to tell the story."
translation.zh: 我觉得：“天呐 你说的太好了” 以后我们可以在回忆录里这样写

translation.en: You know? I turned to Caleb, and he looked up at me.
translation.zh: 以后我们可以在回忆录里这样写 “我转向凯勒布 他抬头看着我 说

translation.en: -And he said, "You’re not a man. You’re God." -Yeah, but I didn’t say that.
translation.zh: 他抬头看着我 说 ‘你不是人 你是神’” 我可没那么说

translation.en: So, anyway–
You’re impressed?
[ Chuckles ] Yes. Yes.
-Although– -"Although"?
[ Laughs ] There’s a qualification to you being impressed?
translation.zh: 让你受震撼还需要条件吗？

translation.en: No. There’s no qualification to her.
Uh, it’s just in the Turing Test,
the machine should be hidden from the examiner.
translation.zh: 机器不应该和测试者见面

translation.en: No, no. We’re way past that.
translation.zh: 不 我们不局限于此

translation.en: If I hid Ava from you so you just heard her voice, she would pass for human.
translation.zh: 如果我不让你和伊娃见面 你听到她的声音 会误以为她是人类

translation.en: The real test is to show you that she’s a robot...
translation.zh: 真正的测试就是 让你看到她是一个机器人

translation.en: and then see if you still feel she has consciousness.
translation.zh: 然后看你能否感觉到她具有意识

translation.en: Yeah, I think you’re probably right.
Her language abilities– they’re incredible.
translation.zh: 她的语言能力非常惊人

translation.en: The system is stochastic. Right?
translation.zh: 这套系统是随机的 对吗？

translation.en: It’s nondeterministic.
At first I thought she was mapping...
from internal semantic form to syntactic free-structure...
translation.zh: 她通过查找语义学结构 以及句法树形结构

translation.en: and then getting linearized words.
But then I started to realize the model is some kind of hybrid.
translation.zh: 不过后来我开始明白 她的语言模式是混合型的

translation.en: Caleb.
No?
I understand that you want me to explain how Ava works.
translation.zh: 我知道你想让我解释伊娃的工作原理

translation.en: But I’m sorry. I’m not gonna be able to do that.
translation.zh: 但是抱歉 我不能解释给你听

translation.en: Try me. I’m hot on high-level abstraction.
translation.zh: 你尽管说 我擅长理解高级的抽象事物

translation.en: It’s not ’cause I think you’re too dumb.
It’s ’cause I wanna have a beer and a conversation with you, not a seminar.
translation.zh: 只是因为我想和你 保持轻松的聊天状态 不想给你讲课

translation.en: [ Chuckles ] Yeah. Sorry.
No, it’s okay. You’re all right.
translation.zh: 不 没关系 我不怪你

translation.en: Just–
Answer me this.
How do you feel about her?
Nothing analytical.
Just... how do you feel?
translation.zh: 就说说你对她有什么感觉？

translation.en: I feel...
that she’s fucking amazing.
Dude.
Cheers.
Cheers.
Damn it.
What the fuck?
[ Female Electronic Voice ] Power cut. Backup power activated.
translation.zh: 停电 备用电力启动

translation.en: [ Chimes ] Full facility lockdown until main generator is restored.
translation.zh: 研究中心全部锁闭 等待主发电机恢复

translation.en: You’re kidding me.
[ Chimes ] Full facility lockdown until main generator is restored.
translation.zh: 研究中心全部锁闭 等待主发电机恢复

translation.en: Power restored.
Hello?
Please insert key card.
[ Nathan ] You don’t have access to use the phone.
Hey.
Sorry, buddy. You understand, though, given Ava...
translation.zh: 抱歉 但你明白 考虑到伊娃

translation.en: and you being kind of an unknown.
I mean, a great guy.
Instant pals and so on, but–
Who you gonna call?
Oh. I don’t know.
translation.zh: 我不知道 没想打给谁

translation.en: No one really. Ghostbusters?
translation.zh: 我不知道 没想打给谁 -《捉鬼敢死队》 -什么？

translation.en: -What? -Who you gonna call? Ghostbusters? It’s a f–
translation.zh: 你要打给谁？ 《捉鬼敢死队》是一部…

translation.en: It’s a movie, man.
You don’t know that movie?
A ghost gives Dan Aykroyd oral sex.
translation.zh: 一只鬼给丹艾克罗伊德口交

translation.en: I was just wondering how the phone worked.
translation.zh: 我只想知道那部电话怎么用

translation.en: That’s all.
So, what are you doing awake at this time? You come to join the party?
translation.zh: 这个时候你怎么还没睡？ 你来加入我的派对吗？

translation.en: Uh, something happened in my room.
translation.zh: 这个时候你怎么还没睡？ 你来加入我的派对吗？ 我房间里出事了

translation.en: Some kind of power cut.
So I came to see what’s going on.
translation.zh: 所以我来看看怎么回事

translation.en: The power cuts, yeah.
We’ve been getting those recently. Uh–
I’m working on it.
I couldn’t open the door to my bedroom.
That’s a security measure.
Automatic lockdown.
Otherwise, anybody could just open the place up by disabling the juice.
translation.zh: 自动锁闭 否则 如果有人切断电力就可能闯进来

translation.en: If it happens again, relax. Okay?
translation.zh: 要是再停电 就放松点 好吗？

translation.en: Sure.
Sweet dreams.
Hey. Hey, man.
Morning. Good morning.
translation.zh: -嘿 -早 早 抱歉 我让京子去叫醒你

translation.en: Sorry to send Kyoko to wake you, but...
translation.zh: 早 抱歉 我让京子去叫醒你

translation.en: I didn’t want too much of the day to slip by.
Yeah, I know. It was a good thing. Thanks.
translation.zh: 我知道 这很好 谢谢

translation.en: She’s some alarm clock, huh?
translation.zh: 她这“闹钟”不错 对吧？

translation.en: Gets you right up in the morning.
So, day two. You ready?
translation.zh: 第二天 准备好了吗？

translation.en: What’s the plan? Hit me.
Yeah, well, I’m not sure.
I’m still trying to figure the examination format. Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 我还在想这种测试形式

translation.en: Yeah, it feels like...
testing Ava through conversation is kind of a– a closed loop.
translation.zh: 通过对话测试伊娃是一个闭环

translation.en: It’s a closed loop? Yeah.
Like testing a chess computer by only playing chess.
translation.zh: 就好像只通过下象棋 来测试一台象棋计算机

translation.en: How else do you test a chess computer?
translation.zh: 测试象棋计算机还有什么方法？

translation.en: Well, it depends.
You know, I mean, you can play it to find out if it makes good moves, but, uh–
translation.zh: 和它下象棋只能测试出 它是否会出妙招 但是…

translation.en: but that won’t tell you if it knows that it’s playing chess.
translation.zh: 但是你无法测试出 它是否知道自己在下象棋

translation.en: And it won’t tell you if it knows what chess is.
translation.zh: 也不会告诉你 它是否知道象棋是什么

translation.en: Uh-huh. So it’s simulation versus actual. Yes.
translation.zh: 这就是仿真和真实之间的差别

translation.en: Yeah. And I think being able to differentiate between those two...
translation.zh: 没错 而我认为真正的图灵测试

translation.en: is the Turing Test you want me to perform.
translation.zh: 就是要能够区分二者之间的差别

translation.en: Look, do me a favor. Lay off the textbook approach.
translation.zh: 听着 别再文绉绉的

translation.en: I just want simple answers to simple questions.
translation.zh: 我只想让你用简单的答案 回答简单的问题

translation.en: Yesterday I asked you how you felt about her and you gave me a great answer.
translation.zh: 昨天我问你对她感觉如何 你的回答非常好

translation.en: Now the question is:
how does she feel about you?
[ Ava ] What do you think?
[ Caleb ] What’s it a drawing of?
Don’t you know? No.
translation.zh: 你不知道吗？ -不知道 -我本以为你会告诉我

translation.en: I thought you would tell me.
translation.zh: -不知道 -我本以为你会告诉我

translation.en: Don’t you know?
I do drawings every day,
but I never know what they’re of.
translation.zh: 但我从来不知道画的是什么

translation.en: You’re not trying to sketch something specific?
translation.zh: 你没有试过画具体的东西吗？

translation.en: Like an object or a person?
translation.zh: 比如一个物体或一个人？

translation.en: Maybe you could try.
Okay.
What object should I draw?
Whatever you want. It’s your decision.
Why is it my decision? I’m interested to see what you’ll choose.
translation.zh: 为什么让我自己决定？ 我很想知道你会选择什么

translation.en: Do you want to be my friend?
Of course.
Will it be possible?
-Why would it not be? -Our conversations are one-sided.
translation.zh: 为什么没可能？ 我们的对话是单方面的

translation.en: You ask circumspect questions and study my responses.
translation.zh: 你谨慎地问我问题 然后研究我的反应

translation.en: Yes.
You learn about me and I learn nothing about you.
translation.zh: 你了解我 但我对你一无所知

translation.en: That’s not a foundation on which friendships are based.
translation.zh: 我们之间缺乏友情的基础

translation.en: So what, you want me to talk about myself?
translation.zh: 怎么？你想让我介绍我自己？

translation.en: Yes. [ Chuckles ]
Wh– Where– [ Chuckles ]
Okay, where do I start?
It’s your decision.
I’m interested to see what you’ll choose.
translation.zh: 我很想知道你会选择什么

translation.en: Okay, Ava.
Well, you know my name.
translation.zh: 好吧 你知道我的名字

translation.en: Yes. I’m 26.
I work at Nathan’s company.
Do you know what his company is?
translation.zh: 你知道他的公司叫什么吗？

translation.en: Blue Book.
Named after Wittgenstein’s notes.
translation.zh: 以维特根斯坦的授课笔记命名

translation.en: It’s the world’s most popular Internet search engine,
translation.zh: 它是世界上 最受欢迎的互联网搜索引擎

translation.en: processing an average of 94% of all Internet search requests.
translation.zh: 处理整个互联网上 大约94%的搜索需求

translation.en: That’s exactly right.
Where do you live, Caleb?
translation.zh: 你住在哪里 凯勒布？

translation.en: Brookhaven, Long Island.
Is it nice there?
It’s okay.
I got an apartment. It’s kind of small.
translation.zh: 我有一间公寓 有点小

translation.en: It’s very small.
But, uh, it’s a five-minute walk to the office...
translation.zh: 但是走路五分钟就能到公司

translation.en: and a five-minute walk to the ocean, which I like.
translation.zh: 走路五分钟也能到海边 我很喜欢

translation.en: Are you married?
Uh, no.
Is your status... single?
translation.zh: 那你的婚姻状况是单身？

translation.en: Yes.
What about your family?
[ Exhales ] I grew up in Portland, Oregon.
translation.zh: 我在俄勒冈的波特兰长大

translation.en: No brothers or sisters.
My parents were both high school teachers.
translation.zh: 我的父母都曾是高中老师

translation.en: And if we’re getting to know each other, I should tell you they’re both dead.
translation.zh: 既然要和你做朋友 那我就可以告诉你 他们都去世了

translation.en: Car crash when I was 15.
translation.zh: 死于我15岁时发生的一场车祸

translation.en: In fact, I was in the car with them.
translation.zh: 事实上 当时我也在车里

translation.en: Backseat.
But it was the front that got the worst of it.
I’m sorry.
It’s all right.
I spent a long time in the hospital afterward.
translation.zh: 后来我在医院住了很长时间

translation.en: Like nearly a year.
And I got into coding.
And by the time I got to college, I was... pretty advanced.
translation.zh: 到我上大学时 我已经非常优秀

translation.en: An advanced programmer.
translation.zh: 一位非常优秀的程序员

translation.en: Yes.
Like Nathan.
Yes.
No.
It’s different.
Nathan wrote the Blue Book base code when he was 13.
translation.zh: 内森13岁时 就写出了“蓝皮书”的基础程序

translation.en: Which, if you understand code, what he did was like Mozart or something.
translation.zh: 如果你懂得编程 你就会知道 他就像莫扎特

translation.en: Do you like Mozart?
I like Depeche Mode. Do you like Nathan?
translation.zh: 我喜欢“赶时髦乐队” 你喜欢内森吗？

translation.en: Yes. Of course.
-Is Nathan your friend? -My friend? I– Yeah. I hope so.
translation.zh: -内森是你的朋友吗？ -朋友？ 我…我希望如此

translation.en: A good friend?
Um, yeah.
Well, no, no, no. I mean, not a good friend. A good friend is–
translation.zh: 哦不 不算是好朋友 好朋友是指…

translation.en: Uh, we only just met each other, you know.
So it takes time to be able to, um– to-to get to know each other, I guess.
translation.zh: 要花一些时间才能… 真正了解对方

translation.en: [ Female Electronic Voice ] Power cut. Backup power activated.
translation.zh: 停电 备用电力启动

translation.en: Caleb.
You’re wrong.
Wrong about what?
Nathan.
In what way?
He isn’t your friend.
Excuse me?
I’m sorry. Ava, I-I don’t understand.
translation.zh: 抱歉 伊娃 我不懂

translation.en: You shouldn’t trust him.
You shouldn’t trust anything he says.
translation.zh: 他说的任何话你都不应该信

translation.en: Power restored.
And if we made a list of books or works of art which we both know,
translation.zh: 如果我们罗列出彼此都知道的书

translation.en: it would form the ideal basis of a discussion.
translation.zh: 应该会成为我们之间很好的谈资

translation.en: Is that okay?
Caleb?
Mm-hmm. Yeah.
Good.
[ Caleb ] Thank you.
Oh, shit! Are you fucking kidding me?
translation.zh: 哦 该死！你搞什么啊？

translation.en: Did it get on you?
translation.zh: -有没有洒到你身上？ -没有 没…

translation.en: No, no, it’s, uh– it’s all right. I got it.
translation.zh: -有没有洒到你身上？ -没有 没… 没关系

translation.en: Dude, you’re wasting your time talking to her. She doesn’t understand English.
translation.zh: 不用搭理她 她听不懂英语 把餐巾给她

translation.en: Just give her the napkin.
translation.zh: 她听不懂英语 把餐巾给她

translation.en: Sorry.
[ Nathan ] It’s just– It’s like a firewall against leaks.
It means I can talk trade secrets over dinner and know it’ll go no further.
translation.zh: 我在吃饭时谈商业秘密 也不用担心会被传出去

translation.en: It also means that I can’t tell her that I’m pissed when she’s so fucking clumsy...
translation.zh: 不过当她笨手笨脚 把酒洒在客人身上时

translation.en: that she spills wine over my houseguest.
translation.zh: 我说我生气了 她也听不懂

translation.en: I think she gets that you’re pissed.
translation.zh: 我猜她已经知道你生气了

translation.en: Yeah? Good. ’Cause I am pissed.
translation.zh: 是吗？很好 因为我真的生气了

translation.en: Hey, Kyoko.
Go-go.
It’s funny.
You know?
No matter how rich you get, shit goes wrong.
translation.zh: 无论你多富 每天还是避不开麻烦事

translation.en: You can’t insulate yourself from it.
translation.zh: 每天还是避不开麻烦事

translation.en: I used to think it was death and taxes you couldn’t avoid,
translation.zh: 我曾以为避不开的是死亡和缴税

translation.en: but it’s actually death and shit.
translation.zh: 但其实是死亡和麻烦事

translation.en: It’s like these power cuts.
You would not believe how much I spent on the generator system,
translation.zh: 我在发电系统上花了很多钱

translation.en: but I keep getting failures every day.
Do you know why they happen? No.
The system was supposed to be bulletproof,
translation.zh: 这套系统本不应该出故障

translation.en: but obviously, the guys that installed it fucked something up.
translation.zh: 但显然 安装工把它搞砸了

translation.en: Can’t you just get them to come back?
translation.zh: 为什么不让他们来修理？

translation.en: No. There’s too much classified stuff here.
translation.zh: 不行 这里有很多机密的东西

translation.en: So after the job was done, I just had ’em all killed.
translation.zh: 等这项研究结束后 我会把他们都杀了

translation.en: Anyway, here’s to your second day, buddy.
translation.zh: 不说这个了 为你第二天的测试干杯

translation.en: Cheers.
Cheers.
So, how did it go? What do you have to report?
translation.zh: 测试怎么样？你有什么要汇报的？

translation.en: You saw how the day went, didn’t you?
I mean, I assume you’re, uh, watching on the CCTV.
translation.zh: 我猜你一直都在… 通过闭路电视监控

translation.en: Sure. But I wanna hear your take on it.
translation.zh: 是的 但我想知道你有什么看法

translation.en: Yeah, there was one interesting thing that happened with– with Ava today.
translation.zh: 伊娃今天做了一件有趣的事

translation.en: Yeah? Yeah.
She made a joke.
Right. When she threw your line back at you. Yeah.
translation.zh: 对 她把那句 “我很想知道你会选择什么”

translation.en: About being interested to see what she’d choose. Right. I noticed that too.
translation.zh: 原封不动 还了给你 我也注意到了

translation.en: Yeah, and it got me thinking, you know, it’s a–
In a way it’s the best indication of AI that I’ve seen in her so far.
translation.zh: 目前为止最能体现她人工智能的地方

translation.en: It’s discreetly complicated.
translation.zh: 目前为止最能体现她人工智能的地方 非常复杂

translation.en: It’s like, uh– It’s kind of non-autistic.
What do you mean?
She could only do that with an awareness of her own mind...
translation.zh: 她能够运用她的思维意识

translation.en: and... also an awareness of mine.
translation.zh: 她能够运用她的思维意识 以及我的思维意识

translation.en: Oh, she’s aware of you, all right.
translation.zh: 哦 她能理解你的思想

translation.en: And what about the power cut?
Sorry? The power cut.
It’s the only part that I couldn’t see.
translation.zh: 只有停电那一段我看不到

translation.en: Cameras fail, I lose audio, the works.
translation.zh: 摄像头失灵 我听不到声音 无法记录

translation.en: So what happened?
Nothing.
Nothing? She didn’t... remark on it at all?
translation.zh: 没什么 是吗？她没有对停电发表任何看法？

translation.en: No.
Not really.
Hey.
Hey.
You wanna see something cool?
This is where Ava was created.
translation.zh: 伊娃就是在这里被研制出来的

translation.en: Go ahead. Take a look.
Sorry.
If you knew the trouble I had...
translation.zh: 你不知道研制过程有多难

translation.en: getting an AI to read and duplicate facial expressions.
translation.zh: 让人工智能阅读和模仿面部表情

translation.en: You know how I cracked it?
translation.zh: 你知道我是怎么解决的吗？

translation.en: I don’t know how you did any of this.
translation.zh: 你做的这些我都搞不懂

translation.en: Every cell phone, just about,
has a microphone, camera and a means to transmit data.
translation.zh: 都有麦克风、摄像头和数据传输通道

translation.en: So I turned on every microphone and camera... across the entire fucking planet...
translation.zh: 所以 我打开世界上 所有的麦克风和摄像头

translation.en: and I redirected the data through Blue Book. Boom.
translation.zh: 通过“蓝皮书”传输这些数据

translation.en: Limitless resource of vocal and facial interaction.
translation.zh: 无穷无尽的声音和面部互动资源

translation.en: You hacked the world’s cell phones?
translation.zh: 你侵入了世界上所有的手机？

translation.en: Yeah. And all the manufacturers knew I was doing it too.
translation.zh: 是的 而且所有的制造商 对我的行为都心知肚明

translation.en: But they couldn’t accuse me without admitting they were doing it themselves.
translation.zh: 但他们无法指控我 因为他们自己也在这么做

translation.en: Here... we have her mind.
translation.zh: 你看 这就是她的脑部

translation.en: Structured gel.
I had to get away from circuitry.
translation.zh: 不能使用电路 因为我需要让它能够

translation.en: I needed something that could arrange and rearrange on a molecular level...
translation.zh: 不能使用电路 因为我需要让它能够 在分子水平上组成并且重组

translation.en: but keep its form when required.
translation.zh: 但又能在需要时保持形状

translation.en: Holding for memories. Shifting for thoughts.
translation.zh: 记忆时保持不变 而思维时改变

translation.en: This is your hardware?
Wetware.
And the– Oh. And the software?
Well, I’m sure you can guess.
Blue Book.
Here’s the weird thing about search engines.
translation.zh: 搜索引擎就是这么奇怪

translation.en: It was like... striking oil...
in a world that hadn’t invented internal combustion.
translation.zh: 在尚未发明内燃机的世界里 发现了油田

translation.en: Too much raw material. Nobody knew what to do with it.
translation.zh: 太多原材料 但没人知道该怎样利用

translation.en: You see, my competitors, they were fixated on sucking it up and monetizing...
translation.zh: 而我的竞争对手们 他们只专注于吸收这些原材料 通过电子商务和社交媒体来赚钱

translation.en: via shopping and social media.
translation.zh: 通过电子商务和社交媒体来赚钱

translation.en: They thought that search engines were a map of what people were thinking.
translation.zh: 他们以为搜索引擎 是用来探寻人们在思考什么

translation.en: But actually they were a map of how people were thinking.
translation.zh: 但其实搜索引擎 是用来探寻人们是怎样思考的

translation.en: Impulse. Response.
And fluid, imperfect.
Patterned.
Chaotic.
I drew the picture of something specific, as you asked.
translation.zh: 我画了具体的东西 正如你要求的

translation.en: You said it would be interesting to see what I would draw.
translation.zh: 你说你想看看我会画什么

translation.en: Is it interesting?
Yes, it is.
You’ve never been outside this building?
No.
You’ve never walked outside?
I’ve never been outside the room I am in now.
translation.zh: 我从未走出过这个房间

translation.en: Where would you go if you did go outside?
translation.zh: 如果你能出去 你想去哪里？

translation.en: I’m not sure.
There are so many options.
Maybe a busy pedestrian and traffic intersection in a city.
translation.zh: 也许去城市中 一条人潮拥挤的步行街或者十字路口

translation.en: A traffic intersection?
Is that a bad idea?
No. I– Uh, it wasn’t what I was expecting.
translation.zh: 不会啊 这和我预想的不一样

translation.en: A traffic intersection would provide a concentrated but shifting view of human life.
translation.zh: 十字路口集中展现了 人生百态

translation.en: People watching.
Yes. Hmm.
We could go together.
It’s a date.
There’s something else I wanted to show you.
Okay.
You might think it’s stupid.
translation.zh: 你可能会觉得这样很傻

translation.en: I don’t think I will– whatever it is.
Then close your eyes.
Okay.
Now open your eyes.
How do I look?
You look...
good.
This is what I’d wear on our date.
translation.zh: 我们约会那天我就穿这一件

translation.en: Right. First a traffic intersection.
translation.zh: 好的 先去十字路口

translation.en: Then maybe a show.
I’d like us to go on a date. Yeah.
Yeah.
It’d be fun.
Are you attracted to me?
What? Are you attracted to me?
You give me indications that you are.
translation.zh: 根据迹象来看 你喜欢

translation.en: -I do? -Yes.
How? Micro expressions.
Micro expressions. The way your eyes fix on my eyes and lips.
translation.zh: 微表情 你盯着我的眼睛和嘴唇时的眼神

translation.en: The way you hold my gaze...
or don’t.
Do you think about me when we aren’t together?
translation.zh: 我们不在一起时 你是否会想起我？

translation.en: Sometimes at night...
I’m wondering if you’re watching me on the cameras.
translation.zh: 我会想 你是不是在通过摄像头看我

translation.en: And I hope you are.
Now your micro expressions are telegraphing discomfort.
translation.zh: 现在你的微表情表明你不自在

translation.en: I am not sure you’d call them micro.
translation.zh: 我不知道你是否该称之为“微”表情

translation.en: I don’t wanna make you feel uncomfortable.
-[ Caleb ] I got a question. -[ Nathan ] Okay.
translation.zh: 我有个问题 -说吧 -你为什么要给她设置性欲？

translation.en: Why did you give her sexuality?
translation.zh: -说吧 -你为什么要给她设置性欲？

translation.en: An AI doesn’t need a gender.
She could have been a gray box.
translation.zh: 你可以把她做成一个灰色的盒子

translation.en: Hmm. Actually, I don’t think that’s true.
Can you give an example of consciousness at any level, human or animal,
translation.zh: 世界上有哪个有意识的生命 不管人或者动物

translation.en: that exists without a sexual dimension?
They have sexuality as an evolutionary reproductive need.
translation.zh: 他们有性别 是进化和繁殖的需要

translation.en: What imperative does a gray box have to interact with another gray box?
translation.zh: 那一个灰盒子和另一个灰盒子 有什么好互动的？

translation.en: Can consciousness exist without interaction?
translation.zh: 没有互动怎么可能有意识呢？

translation.en: Anyway, sexuality is fun, man.
translation.zh: 再说 有性征也很有趣

translation.en: If you’re gonna exist, why not enjoy it?
translation.zh: 既然她已存在 为什么不享受它呢？

translation.en: What, you wanna remove the chance of her falling in love and fucking?
translation.zh: 怎么？你想让她失去 爱上别人和做爱的机会吗？

translation.en: And in answer to your real question,
you bet she can fuck.
What?
In between her legs there’s an opening, with a concentration of sensors.
translation.zh: 在她的双腿间 有一个开口 里面集成了传感器

translation.en: You engage ’em in the right way, creates a pleasure response.
translation.zh: 如果你使用方法得当 会产生愉悦感

translation.en: So if you wanted to screw her, mechanically speaking, you could,
translation.zh: 如果你想和她做爱 从机械角度讲 是可以的

translation.en: and she’d enjoy it.
That wasn’t my real question.
Oh. Okay. Sorry.
My real question was:
did you give her sexuality as a diversion tactic?
translation.zh: 你给她设置性欲 是不是一种分散注意力的策略？

translation.en: -I don’t follow. -Like a stage magician with a hot assistant.
translation.zh: 我没听懂 就像舞台上的魔术师 都有一个漂亮的助理

translation.en: So a hot robot who clouds your ability to judge her AI?
translation.zh: 你是说我用性感的机器人 妨碍你判断她是人工智能的能力？

translation.en: Exactly. So, did you program her to flirt with me?
translation.zh: 是的 那么… 你是不是设定了程序 让她和我调情？

translation.en: If I did, would that be cheating? Wouldn’t it?
translation.zh: -如果是这样 我算不算欺骗？ -你说呢？

translation.en: Caleb, what’s your type?
translation.zh: 凯勒布 你喜欢什么样的？

translation.en: -Of girl? -No, of salad dressing.
translation.zh: -你说女人？ -不 我说沙拉酱

translation.en: Yeah, of girl. What’s your type of girl?
translation.zh: 当然是说女人 你喜欢什么样的女人？

translation.en: You know what? Don’t even answer that. Let’s say it’s black chicks.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？你甚至不用回答 假设你喜欢黑人

translation.en: Okay? That’s your thing. For the sake of argument, that’s your thing. Okay?
translation.zh: 假设是这样 这个就别争论了 只是假设 好吗？

translation.en: Why is that your thing?
Because you did a detailed analysis of all racial types...
translation.zh: 因为你对所有人种进行了具体的分析

translation.en: and you cross-referenced that analysis with a points-based system?
translation.zh: 然后你参照分数系统的分析 得出这种结论？

translation.en: No. You’re just attracted to black chicks.
translation.zh: 不！ 你就是喜欢黑人

translation.en: A consequence of accumulated external stimuli...
translation.zh: 那是外界刺激累积的结果

translation.en: that you probably didn’t even register as they registered with you.
translation.zh: 当这种刺激作用在你身上时 你可能都没意识到

translation.en: Did you program her to like me or not?
translation.zh: 你有没有给她编程 让她喜欢我？

translation.en: [ Sighs ] I programmed her to be heterosexual.
translation.zh: 我只是通过编程让她成为异性恋

translation.en: Just like you were programmed to be heterosexual.
translation.zh: 就如同你被编程设定为异性恋一样

translation.en: Nobody programmed me to be straight.
You decided to be straight? Please. Of course you were programmed.
translation.zh: 是你自己决定当直男的？拜托 你当然是被编程了

translation.en: By nature or nurture or both.
translation.zh: 编程者可能是大自然 或者养育你的人 或者两者都是

translation.en: And to be honest, Caleb, you’re starting to annoy me now...
translation.zh: 说实话 凯勒布 你现在有点惹恼我了

translation.en: because this is your insecurity talking.
translation.zh: 因为这是你没有安全感的表现

translation.en: This is not your intellect.
Come with me.
You know this guy, right?
Jackson Pollock. Jackson Pollock.
translation.zh: -杰克逊波洛克 -杰克逊波洛克 说得对

translation.en: That’s right. The drip painter.
Okay, he let his mind go blank... and his hand go where it wanted.
translation.zh: 他清空自己的思想 让他的手随意挥洒

translation.en: Not deliberate. Not random.
translation.zh: 不是有意 也不是随机

translation.en: Someplace in between.
They called it "automatic art."
Let’s make this like Star Trek, okay?
translation.zh: 我们当这是在《星际迷航》里吧？

translation.en: Engage intellect.
Excuse me? I’m Kirk. Your head’s the warp drive.
translation.zh: 什么？ 我是寇克 你的脑子是“曲速引擎”

translation.en: "Engage intellect."
What if Pollock had reversed the challenge?
translation.zh: 如果波洛克的挑战反一反呢？

translation.en: What if instead of making art without thinking,
translation.zh: 如果他不是自由地作画 而是说 “你知道吗？

translation.en: he says, "You know what? I can’t paint anything...
translation.zh: 如果他不是自由地作画 而是说 “你知道吗？ 除非我明确知道我为什么要画画 我什么都画不出来”

translation.en: unless I know exactly why I’m doing it."
translation.zh: 除非我明确知道我为什么要画画 我什么都画不出来”

translation.en: What would have happened?
He never would have made a single mark.
translation.zh: 他可能一辈子碌碌无闻

translation.en: Yes! You see, there’s my guy.
translation.zh: 对！你可说对了 这才像你嘛

translation.en: There’s my buddy who thinks before he opens his mouth.
translation.zh: 对！你可说对了 这才像你嘛 说话之前先过过脑子

translation.en: He never would have made a single mark.
The challenge is not to act automatically.
translation.zh: 真正的挑战不是自动的行为

translation.en: It’s to find an action that is not automatic–
translation.zh: 而是找到不自动的行为

translation.en: from painting to breathing to talking...
translation.zh: 不论是画画 还是呼吸 讲话

translation.en: to fucking...
to falling in love.
And for the record, Ava’s not pretending to like you.
translation.zh: 声明一下 伊娃不是假装喜欢你

translation.en: And her flirting isn’t an algorithm to fake you out.
translation.zh: 她和你调情 不是编好的用来欺骗你的算式

translation.en: You’re the first man she’s met that isn’t me.
translation.zh: 除了我 你是他认识的第一个男人

translation.en: And I’m like her dad, right?
translation.zh: 而我算是他的父亲 对吗？

translation.en: Can you blame her for getting a crush on you?
translation.zh: 你能责怪她喜欢上你吗？

translation.en: No, you can’t.
When I was in college, I did a semester on AI theory.
translation.zh: 我上大学的时候 有一个学期学的是人工智能理论

translation.en: It was a thought experiment they gave us.
translation.zh: 我们接受了一项思维实验

translation.en: It’s called "Mary in the black-and-white room."
translation.zh: 名字叫做“黑白屋中的玛丽”

translation.en: Mary is a scientist,
and her specialist subject is color.
She knows everything there is to know about it.
The wavelengths. The neurological effects.
translation.zh: 颜色的波长 神经学效应

translation.en: Every possible property that color can have.
But she lives in a black-and-white room.
translation.zh: 但她住在一间黑白屋中

translation.en: She was born there and raised there.
translation.zh: 她在那里出生 在那里长大

translation.en: And she can only observe the outside world on a black-and-white monitor.
translation.zh: 她只能通过一个黑白显示器观察外界

translation.en: And then one day someone opens the door.
translation.zh: 有一天 有人打开了门

translation.en: And Mary walks out.
And she sees a blue sky.
And at that moment, she learns something that all her studies couldn’t tell her.
translation.zh: 就在那一刻 她知道了她的研究无法告诉她的事

translation.en: She learns what it feels like... to see color.
translation.zh: 她知道了看到颜色是一种什么感觉

translation.en: The thought experiment was to show the students...
translation.zh: 那项思维实验就是要让学生知道

translation.en: the difference between a computer and a human mind.
translation.zh: 计算机和人脑之间的区别

translation.en: The computer is Mary in the black-and-white room.
translation.zh: 计算机就是黑白屋中的玛丽

translation.en: The human is when she walks out.
translation.zh: 而人类就是走出黑白屋的玛丽

translation.en: Did you know that I was brought here to test you?
translation.zh: 你知道我来是为了测试你吗？

translation.en: No.
Why did you think I was here?
translation.zh: 那你觉得我来是为了什么？

translation.en: I didn’t know. I didn’t question it.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我没想过

translation.en: I’m here to test if you have a consciousness... or if you’re just simulating one.
translation.zh: 我来是为了测试 看你是真的有意识 还是只会模仿

translation.en: Nathan isn’t sure if you have one or not.
translation.zh: 内森不确定你是否有意识

translation.en: How does that make you feel?
translation.zh: 我这么说 你有什么感觉？

translation.en: It makes me feel sad.
[ Female Electronic Voice ] Power cut. Backup power activated.
translation.zh: 停电 备用电力启动

translation.en: -Why did you tell me I shouldn’t trust Nathan? -Because he tells lies.
translation.zh: 你为什么说我不应该相信内森？ -因为他说谎 -说什么谎？

translation.en: -Lies about what? -Everything.
translation.zh: -因为他说谎 -说什么谎？ 一切

translation.en: Including the power cuts?
What do you mean?
Don’t you think it’s possible that he’s watching us? Right now.
translation.zh: 你难道不觉得 他有可能在监视我们？就现在？

translation.en: That the blackouts are orchestrated...
translation.zh: 停电只不过是他策划的

translation.en: so he can see how we behave when we think we’re unobserved.
translation.zh: 这样他就能看到 我们自以为不被监视时的举动

translation.en: I charge my batteries via induction plates.
translation.zh: 我通过电磁感应盘充电

translation.en: If I reverse the power flow, it overloads the system.
translation.zh: 如果我将电流逆转 系统就会超负荷

translation.en: You’re causing the cuts?
So we can see how we behave when we’re unobserved.
translation.zh: 这样我们就能看到彼此 在不被监视时是什么样

translation.en: Not bad, huh?
Yeah.
Can we talk about the lies you’ve been spinning me?
translation.zh: 我们能聊聊你对我撒的谎吗？

translation.en: What lies?
I didn’t win a competition.
I wasn’t... part of a lottery.
translation.zh: 我不是 抽奖抽中的 我是被你选中的

translation.en: I was selected.
translation.zh: 抽奖抽中的 我是被你选中的

translation.en: It’s obvious, once I stop to think.
translation.zh: 我稍加思考 就想明白了

translation.en: Why would you randomly select an examiner for the Turing Test?
translation.zh: 你为什么会随机 选一个人参加“图灵测试”？

translation.en: You could have had some bean counter turn up at your front door.
translation.zh: 出现在你门口的可能会是个数节拍的

translation.en: The guy who fixes the air-conditioning.
The competition was a smoke screen.
I didn’t want anyone to know what I was doing here...
translation.zh: 我不想让别人知道我在这里的研究

translation.en: or why I required you.
-Why me? -I needed someone that would ask the right questions.
translation.zh: 为什么选我？ 我需要真正会问问题的人

translation.en: So I did a search, and I found the most talented coder in my company.
translation.zh: 于是我进行搜索 发现了我公司里最聪明的程序员

translation.en: You know, instead of seeing this as a deception, you should see it as proof.
translation.zh: 你不应该觉得这是一种欺骗 你应该将它视为一种证明

translation.en: Proof of what? Come on, Caleb.
translation.zh: 证明什么？ 拜托 凯勒布 我还不知道聪明是什么感觉？

translation.en: You don’t think I know what it’s like to be smart?
translation.zh: 拜托 凯勒布 我还不知道聪明是什么感觉？

translation.en: Smarter than everyone else. Jockeying for position.
translation.zh: 比其他人都聪明 想要出人头地

translation.en: You got the light on you, man.
Not lucky. Chosen.
translation.zh: 你不是幸运 你是被选中的

translation.en: Kyoko.
Kyoko.
Where’s Nathan?
Where’s Nathan? Jesus Christ. You really don’t speak a word of English?
translation.zh: 内森在哪里？ 天呐 你真的一句英语都不会说？

translation.en: What the fuck?
Oh, no, no, no. No.
Stop.
No, no, don’t do that. Don’t do that. You don’t have to do that.
translation.zh: 不 别这样 你不用这样

translation.en: What are you doing?
I told you, you’re wasting your time talking to her.
translation.zh: 我早告诉你了 和她说话就是浪费时间

translation.en: However, you would not be wasting your time...
translation.zh: 不过 如果你和她跳舞

translation.en: if you were dancing with her.
Go ahead. Dance with her. Dance with her.
translation.zh: 去吧 和她一起跳 快去啊

translation.en: You don’t like dancing?
♪ Saturday morning ♪ She does.
♪ Friday’s enemy ♪ Come on, buddy.
After a long day of Turing Tests, you gotta unwind.
translation.zh: 经过一天的“图灵测试” 你必须放松一下

translation.en: ♪ Housework is calling ♪ What were you doing with Ava? What?
You tore up her picture.
I’m gonna tear up the fuckin’ dance floor, dude. Check it out.
translation.zh: 我要展示我的舞技 你瞧着

translation.en: Come on, Caleb!
Oh, everything’s spinning.
translation.zh: 我眼里的东西都在打转

translation.en: It’s ’cause you’re drunk. [ Chimes ]
No, it’s called relativity. Everything is spinning.
translation.zh: 不 这是“相对论” 所有的东西都在转

translation.en: It’s just being drunk makes it worse.
translation.zh: 只不过喝醉之后转得更厉害了

translation.en: I’m not going in there.
Lights. [ Chimes ]
[ Ava On Monitor ] Today, I’m going to test you.
[ Caleb On Monitor ] Test me?
And please remember, while you’re taking the test, that if you lie, I will know.
translation.zh: 请记住 当我测试你时 如果你撒谎

translation.en: Oh. Right.
Question one.
What’s your favorite color?
translation.zh: 你最喜欢的颜色是什么？

translation.en: -Red. -Lie.
Lie? Yes. Lie.
Then– [ Chuckles ] Then what is my favorite color?
translation.zh: 那么… 你说我最喜欢的颜色是什么？

translation.en: I don’t know, but it isn’t red.
translation.zh: 我不知道 但不是红色

translation.en: Okay, I get it.
translation.zh: 好的 我懂了 我猜

translation.en: I guess, seeing as I’m not six,
translation.zh: 好的 我懂了 我猜 我已经不是六岁小孩儿了 没有什么“最喜欢的颜色”

translation.en: I don’t really have a favorite color.
translation.zh: 我已经不是六岁小孩儿了 没有什么“最喜欢的颜色”

translation.en: Better answer.
Question two.
What’s your earliest memory?
Well, actually, it’s a– it’s a memory of kindergarten.
There was a kid– Lie.
It’s a– Really? Yes.
All right. So there is... a kind of an earlier memory.
translation.zh: 好吧 是还有… 更早一点的记忆

translation.en: It’s just a sound.
And sky.
Or maybe blue.
I think this sound is my mother’s voice.
translation.zh: 我记得声音是我母亲的声音

translation.en: Question three.
Are you a good person? Oh. Holy shit.
translation.zh: 你是好人吗？ 我的天

translation.en: [ Laughs ] Look, can we stop the test?
translation.zh: 我的天 我们能不能停止这个测试？

translation.en: Uh, you’re a walking lie detector, and I just realized this is a fucking minefield.
translation.zh: 你就是一个会走路的测谎仪 我刚刚才意识到这是一个雷区

translation.en: No. We can’t stop. Hmm?
Are you a good person?
Yeah. I think so.
Question four.
What will happen to me if I fail your test?
translation.zh: 如果我在你的测试中失败了 我会怎么样？

translation.en: Ava. Will it be bad?
I– I don’t know.
Do you think I might be switched off...
’cause I don’t function as well as I’m supposed to?
translation.zh: 因为我的功能没有符合预期？ 伊娃 我不知道你这个问题的答案

translation.en: Ava, I don’t know the answer to your question.
translation.zh: 伊娃 我不知道你这个问题的答案

translation.en: It’s not up to me.
Why is it up to anyone?
Do you have people who test you and might switch you off?
translation.zh: 有人测试你 然后可能把你关闭吗？

translation.en: -No, I don’t. -Then why do I?
[ Female Electronic Voice ] Power cut. Backup power activated.
translation.zh: 停电 备用电力启动

translation.en: I wanna be with you.
Question five.
Do you want to be with me?
Why did you make Ava?
That’s an odd question. Wouldn’t you if you could?
translation.zh: 这个问题很古怪 如果你有这水平 你会研制吗？

translation.en: Maybe.
I don’t know.
I’m asking why you did it.
translation.zh: 我在问你为什么要研制她

translation.en: Look, the arrival of strong artificial intelligence has been inevitable for decades.
translation.zh: 强大的人工智能 在未来几十年里势必会到来

translation.en: And the variable was when, not if.
translation.zh: 问题只是“何时到来” 而不是“是否会到来”

translation.en: So I don’t see Ava as a decision, just an evolution.
translation.zh: 问题只是“何时到来” 而不是“是否会到来” 所以 伊娃对我来说不是一个决定 而是一项进化

translation.en: I think it’s the next model...
that’s gonna be the real breakthrough.
translation.zh: 将真正具有划时代意义

translation.en: The singularity. Next model?
translation.zh: 它的奇特 下一个型号？

translation.en: After Ava.
I didn’t know there was gonna be a model after Ava.
translation.zh: 我没想到 伊娃之后还会有一个型号

translation.en: Yeah, why, you thought she was a one-off?
translation.zh: 怎么？你以为我一次就研制出了她？

translation.en: No, I knew there must have been prototypes, so I–
translation.zh: 不 我知道之前肯定有雏形 所以…

translation.en: I knew she wasn’t the first, but I thought maybe the last.
translation.zh: 我知道她不是第一个 但我以为她可能是最后一个

translation.en: Well, Ava doesn’t exist in isolation any more than you or me.
translation.zh: 伊娃和你我不同 她不是完全独立的

translation.en: She’s part of a continuum. So version 9.6 and so on.
translation.zh: 她是系列产品之一 9点6版 每次都有改进

translation.en: And each time they get a little bit better.
When you make a new model, what do you do with the old one?
translation.zh: 如果新型号研制出来 你怎么处理旧型号？

translation.en: Well, I, uh, download the mind, unpack the data,
translation.zh: 我会下载她脑部资料 解压数据

translation.en: add in the new routines I’ve been writing.
And to do that, you end up partially formatting, so the memories go.
translation.zh: 这么做需要进行部分格式化 所以记忆会被清除

translation.en: But the body survives. And Ava’s body’s a good one.
translation.zh: 但还会保留躯体 伊娃的躯体很不错

translation.en: You feel bad for Ava?
[ Sighs ] Feel bad for yourself, man.
One day the AI’s are gonna look back on us...
translation.zh: 终有一天 人工智能回过头来看我们

translation.en: the same way we look at fossil skeletons in the plains of Africa.
translation.zh: 就像我们看非洲平原上的化石骨架

translation.en: An upright ape, living in dust, with crude language and tools.
translation.zh: 我们就像直立行走的猿 活在尘土中 使用简单的语言和工具

translation.en: All set for extinction.
"I am become Death, the destroyer of worlds."
translation.zh: “我变成了死神 世界的毁灭者”

translation.en: There you go again. Mr. Quotable.
There you go again. It’s not my quote.
translation.zh: 你又说错了 这不是我的名言

translation.en: It’s what Oppenheimer said after he made the atomic bomb. The atomic bomb.
translation.zh: 这是奥本海默 在研制出原子弹之后说的

translation.en: Yeah, I know what it is, dude.
translation.zh: 研制出原子弹之后说的 我知道

translation.en: Hey.
I’d say we’re about due a refill.
Bottoms up.
In battle, in the forest, on the precipice of the mountain.
translation.zh: “在战场上 在森林中 在悬崖峭壁上

translation.en: On the–
the great, dark sea.
In sleep. In confusion.
translation.zh: 在睡梦中 在彷徨中

translation.en: In the depths of shame.
The good deeds a man has done before defend him.
translation.zh: 一个人曾经的善行会捍卫他”

translation.en: The good deeds man has done before defends him.
translation.zh: “一个人曾经的善行会捍卫他”

translation.en: The good deeds man has done before...
defends him.
It is what it is.
It’s Promethean, man.
Jesus Christ.
How are you feeling today?
Why won’t you let me out?
I already told you why.
Because you’re very special.
Why won’t you let me out? We’re gonna do this again?
translation.zh: 你为什么不让我出去？ 还要再来一次吗？

translation.en: [ Shouting ] Why won’t you let me out?
Oh, fuck. Where’s my card?
Damn it!
What’s the problem, Nathan? I lost my key card.
translation.zh: -怎么了 内森？ -我的钥匙卡不见了

translation.en: You dropped it.
It’s right here.
Thank you.
I didn’t know where you were.
I waited all yesterday afternoon and all last night.
translation.zh: 我昨天下午和昨天晚上一直在等你

translation.en: I thought I wasn’t gonna see you again.
translation.zh: 我以为再也见不到你了

translation.en: Aren’t you gonna say something?
I’m waiting. Waiting?
Power cut. Backup power activated. Don’t talk. Just listen.
translation.zh: -停电 备用电力启动 -别说话 听我说

translation.en: You were right about Nathan. Everything you said.
translation.zh: 关于内森 你是对的 你说的都是对的

translation.en: What’s he gonna do to me?
He’s gonna reprogram your AI, which is the same as killing you.
translation.zh: 他要给你的人工智能重新编程 相当于杀死你

translation.en: Caleb?
translation.zh: 凯勒布 你要帮帮我

translation.en: -You have to help me. -I’m going to.
translation.zh: 凯勒布 你要帮帮我 我会的 我们今晚就逃出去

translation.en: We’re getting out of here tonight.
translation.zh: 我会的 我们今晚就逃出去

translation.en: -How? -I get Nathan blind drunk.
translation.zh: 怎么逃？ 我会把内森灌醉

translation.en: Then I take his key card and reprogram all the security protocols in this place.
translation.zh: 然后拿走他的钥匙卡 对这里所有的安全协议重新编程

translation.en: When he wakes, he’s locked inside, and we’ve walked out of here.
translation.zh: 等他醒来时 他会被锁在里面 那时我们已经逃出去了

translation.en: I just need you to do one thing.
At 10:00 tonight, you trigger a power failure.
translation.zh: 今晚10点 你把电停掉

translation.en: Can you do that?
Yes.
Dude.
Hey. Hey.
You know what day it is? No.
translation.zh: -知道今天什么日子吗？ -不知道

translation.en: It’s your last. Helicopter comes tomorrow morning, 8:00 AM.
translation.zh: 你的最后一天 直升机明天早上8点就来

translation.en: Wow. Has it been a whole week?
Time flies.
Man, but what a thing we’ve shared, huh?
translation.zh: 但我们一起做了伟大的事 对吗？

translation.en: Something to tell the grandchildren, right? Yeah.
translation.zh: 值得对子孙炫耀 不是吗？

translation.en: After they’ve signed their NDA’s.
translation.zh: 那他们必须签署保密协议才行

translation.en: [ Laughing ] Yeah, their NDA’s.
Dude, you crack me up, man.
You know what?
I’m not getting all maudlin or anything, but I’m gonna miss having you around.
translation.zh: 我不太容易动情 但我会想你的

translation.en: Thanks, man. I appreciate that.
Oh, here, let me say, thank you so much for bringing me here.
translation.zh: 我想说 谢谢你带我来这里

translation.en: Oh. It’s– It’s been a trip.
Yes, it has.
You know what?
We need to drink to that.
Hey.
Oh, no, I’m good. You go ahead.
translation.zh: 不 我不喝 你喝吧

translation.en: What, you don’t want a drink?
No.
Maybe a beer or something.
Caleb, I’m sure you’ve noticed that I’ve been... somewhat overdoing it recently.
translation.zh: 凯勒布 你肯定已经注意到 我最近喝得特别多

translation.en: So when I woke up this morning, I said, "That’s it. Time to hit the old detox."
translation.zh: 所以今天早上醒来 我就对自己说 “好了 该戒酒了”

translation.en: Come on. You’re kidding. You’re gonna make me drink alone?
translation.zh: 别开玩笑了 你想让我一个人喝吗？

translation.en: Man, you wanna get wasted, you go right ahead. Knock yourself out. Literally.
translation.zh: 你想喝 尽管喝个酩酊大醉 真的 我粗茶淡饭 喝点矿泉水就行了

translation.en: But I’m on brown rice and mineral water.
translation.zh: 真的 我粗茶淡饭 喝点矿泉水就行了

translation.en: Cheers then.
So, anyway,
surely now is when you tell me if Ava passed or failed.
translation.zh: 现在你该告诉我 伊娃是否通过了测试

translation.en: Right.
Right.
-Are you gonna keep me in suspense? -No, no.
translation.zh: 你想吊我胃口吗？ 不 她…

translation.en: Her, uh– Her AI is beyond doubt.
translation.zh: 不 她… 她的人工智能毋庸置疑

translation.en: Is it?
She passed?
Yes. Wow!
Wow. That’s fantastic.
Although...
I gotta say, I’m a bit surprised.
translation.zh: 我必须说 我有点惊讶

translation.en: Did we ever get past "the chess problem," as you phrased it?
translation.zh: 我们是不是已经克服了 你说的那个象棋的问题？

translation.en: As in, how do you know if a machine is expressing a real emotion,
translation.zh: 不过你怎么知道 机器是在表达真实感受

translation.en: or just simulating one?
Does Ava actually like you...
or not?
Although now that I think about it, there is... a third option.
translation.zh: 现在我觉得还有第三种可能

translation.en: Not whether she does or does not have the capacity to like you...
translation.zh: 不是说她有没有能力喜欢你

translation.en: but whether she’s pretending to like you.
translation.zh: 而是说 她是否在假装喜欢你

translation.en: Pretending to like me? Yeah.
Well, why would she do that? I don’t know.
translation.zh: -她为什么要那样做？ -我不知道

translation.en: Maybe if she thought of you as a means of escape.
translation.zh: 也许她把你当做一个逃生工具

translation.en: How’s that vodka tasting?
Buddy.
Your head’s been so fucked with.
I don’t think it’s me whose head is fucked.
translation.zh: 我觉得脑子乱的不是我

translation.en: I don’t know, man. I woke up this morning to a tape of you...
translation.zh: 我不知道 我今早醒来 看到了一段你的录像

translation.en: slicing your arm open and punching the mirror.
translation.zh: 你割开胳膊 对着镜子挥拳

translation.en: You seem pretty fucked up to me.
translation.zh: 我觉得你的脑子有点乱

translation.en: You’re a bastard.
Yeah, well, I understand why you’d think that.
translation.zh: 我理解你为什么这么想

translation.en: But believe it or not, I’m actually the guy that’s on your side.
translation.zh: 但不论你信不信 我才是和你站在一边的

translation.en: Come here. I’m gonna let you off the hook. Okay?
translation.zh: 来吧 让我解除你的疑惑 好吗？

translation.en: Come on.
Who are you?
Well–
You think he’s watching us right now?
The cameras are on. Yeah, the cameras are on.
translation.zh: 摄像头开着 是的 摄像头开着

translation.en: But he doesn’t have an audio feed.
So he just sees two people talkin’,
translation.zh: 所以他只能看到两个人在说话

translation.en: havin’ a little chat.
This is cute.
Is it strange to have made something that hates you?
translation.zh: 你自己研制的机器人 却这么恨你 是不是很奇怪？

translation.en: You were right about the magician’s hot assistant.
translation.zh: 你举的那个魔术师 和美女助理的例子是对的

translation.en: -[ Video Stops ] -What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 你举的那个魔术师 和美女助理的例子是对的 你说什么？

translation.en: Misdirection.
I rip up her picture,
which she can then present as an illustration of my cruelty to her... and her love for you.
translation.zh: 她就会误导你 让你看到我对她的残酷和她对你的爱

translation.en: At the same time, it allows me to do this... in full view of you both–
translation.zh: 不过借此机会 我做了另一件事 把你俩都骗了

translation.en: Place a new camera in the room.
translation.zh: 在房间里装了一个新摄像头

translation.en: Battery powered, of course.
translation.zh: 当然 是电池驱动的

translation.en: See it?
And then–
[ Ava ] You have to help me. I’m going to.
translation.zh: 你要帮帮我 我会的

translation.en: We’re getting out of here tonight.
How?
I get Nathan blind drunk.
I take his key card and reprogram all the security protocols in this place.
translation.zh: 然后拿走他的钥匙卡 对这里所有的安全协议重新编程

translation.en: When he wakes up, he’s locked inside, and we’ve walked out of here.
translation.zh: 等他醒来时 他会被锁在里面 那时我们已经逃出去了

translation.en: I just need you to do one thing. Great.
At 10:00 tonight, trigger a power failure.
translation.zh: 今晚10点 你把电停掉

translation.en: Can you do that?
[ Ava ] Yes. Turn it off.
Okay.
You feel stupid, but you really shouldn’t,
translation.zh: 你觉得自己很傻 但你大可不必

translation.en: because proving an AI is... exactly as problematic as you said it would be.
translation.zh: 因为就像你说的那样 要证明一个人工智能并不容易

translation.en: What was the real test?
You.
Ava was a rat in a maze, and I gave her one way out.
translation.zh: 伊娃是迷宫中的老鼠 我只给了她一条出路

translation.en: To escape, she’d have to use...
translation.zh: 要想逃出来 她必须利用

translation.en: self-awareness, imagination, manipulation, sexuality, empathy, and she did.
translation.zh: 自我意识、想象力、操控、性欲 和移情 她做到了

translation.en: Now, if that isn’t true AI, what the fuck is?
translation.zh: 这不就是真正的人工智能吗？

translation.en: So my only function was to be someone she could use to escape?
translation.zh: 所以我唯一的作用就是 作为她可利用的逃生工具？

translation.en: Yeah.
And you didn’t select me because I’m good at coding?
translation.zh: 你选我也不是因为我擅长编程？

translation.en: No. Well... no.
I mean, you’re okay.
translation.zh: 我是说 你编程也不错

translation.en: -Even pretty good, but– -You selected me based on my search engine inputs.
translation.zh: 甚至可以说很好 不过… 你选我的依据是我的搜索引擎记录

translation.en: They showed a good kid.
translation.zh: 它们显示出你是个好人

translation.en: With no family.
With a moral compass.
And no girlfriend.
Did you design Ava’s face based on my pornography profile?
translation.zh: 伊娃的面部是不是你 根据我经常看的色情网页定做的？

translation.en: [ Groans ] Shit, dude.
Did you?
Hey, if a search engine’s good for anything, right? [ Chuckling ]
translation.zh: 搜索引擎无所不能 对吗？

translation.en: Can I just say one thing?
The test worked.
It was a success.
Ava demonstrated true AI, and you were fundamental to that.
translation.zh: 伊娃显示出真正的人工智能 而你的作用不可或缺

translation.en: So if you can just, for a second, separate–
[ Female Electronic Voice ] Power cut. Backup power activated.
translation.zh: 停电 备用电力启动

translation.en: Well, I guess it’s 10:00.
Ava’s gonna be wondering where you are.
translation.zh: 伊娃肯定在想你在哪里

translation.en: Let me ask you something.
Now, how was this plan gonna go anyway? ’Cause you didn’t totally explain.
translation.zh: 你准备如何实施计划？ 因为你没有对她说明白

translation.en: So you were gonna get me drunk, steal my key card...
translation.zh: 你打算把我灌醉 偷走我的钥匙卡

translation.en: and reprogram the security protocols. But reprogram them to what?
translation.zh: 对安全协议重新编程 但是你准备编成什么样？

translation.en: To change the lockdown procedure.
So that in the event of a power cut, instead of sealing, the doors all opened.
translation.zh: 当停电时 不让所有的门都锁闭 而是让门都打开

translation.en: Yeah.
[ Chuckles ] Well, that may have just worked.
Well, we’ll find out.
translation.zh: 对啊 我们拭目以待

translation.en: What do you mean? [ Chuckles ]
I figured you were probably watching us during the power cuts,
translation.zh: 我早猜到停电时 你可能还在监视我们

translation.en: so I already did all those things...
translation.zh: 所以昨天我把你灌醉后

translation.en: when I got you drunk yesterday.
translation.zh: 我已经采取了这些行动

translation.en: What?
Power restored.
Fuck!
Ava.
Go back to your room.
If I do,
are you ever gonna let me out?
Yes.
Stop.
Stop.
Ava, I said stop!
Ava, what are you doing? Stop. Stop.
translation.zh: 伊娃 你要干什么？住手

translation.en: That’s enough. [ Choking ]
All right, that’s–
That’s enough!
That’s enough.
I’m taking you back.
Okay. [ Grunts ]
Fuckin’ unreal.
Okay.
Ava.
Ava.
-What happened? -Will you stay here?
translation.zh: 发生什么了？ 你留在这里 好吗？

translation.en: Stay here?
Ava?
Ava! [ Chiming ]
Ava–
[ Panting ] Okay. Okay. Okay.
